TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NegotiateStream extends System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream

summary.span: Provides a stream that uses the Negotiate security protocol to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in client-server communication.

span.span: Provides a stream that uses the Negotiate security protocol to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in client-server communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別進行驗證，以及協助保護資訊傳輸用戶端與伺服器之間。Use the class for authentication and to help secure information transmitted between a client and a server. 使用，您可以執行下列動作。Using , you can do the following. - 傳送至伺服器的用戶端認證的模擬或委派。Send the client's credentials to the server for Impersonation or Delegation. - 要求伺服器驗證。Request server authentication. - 加密和/或再傳輸簽署資料。Encrypt and/or sign data before transmitting it. 傳輸資訊前，必須執行驗證。Authentication must be performed before transmitting information. 用戶端要求驗證使用同步方法會封鎖直到驗證完成為止，或非同步方法，不會封鎖等候要完成驗證。Clients request authentication using the synchronous methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous methods, which do not block while waiting for the authentication to complete. 伺服器要求驗證使用同步或非同步方法。Servers request authentication using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 用戶端，並選擇性地在伺服器上，會使用驗證交涉安全性通訊協定。The client, and optionally the server, is authenticated using the Negotiate security protocol. 在 Windows 95/98 系統中，Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) 是用於驗證的通訊協定。On Windows 95/98 systems, Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) is the protocol used for authentication. 在其他平台的 Kerberos 通訊協定用於驗證如果用戶端和伺服器支援，否則，系統會使用 NTLM。On other platforms the Kerberos protocol is used for authentication if both client and server support it; otherwise NTLM is used. 如需這些通訊協定的詳細描述，請參閱 Platform SDK 說明文件 MSDN，在 msdn.microsoft.com/library/。For detailed descriptions of these protocols, see the Platform SDK documentation on MSDN, at msdn.microsoft.com/library/. 類別會執行使用安全性支援提供者介面 (SSPI) 驗證。The class performs the authentication using the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI). 當驗證成功時，您必須檢查並屬性，以決定哪些安全性服務將會使用來協助保護您的資料在傳輸期間。When authentication succeeds, you must check the and properties to determine what security services will be used by the to help secure your data during transmission. 檢查屬性來判斷是否發生相互驗證。Check the property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred. 您可以取得遠端用戶端或伺服器使用資訊屬性。You can get information about the remote client or server using the property. 如果驗證失敗，您會收到或。If the authentication fails, you will receive an or a . 在此情況下，您可以重試一次使用不同的認證驗證。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential. 您將使用同步的資料傳送或非同步方法。You send data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 您會收到資料使用同步或非同步方法。You receive data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 如果安全性服務，例如加密或簽章已啟用，這些會自動套用，以將資料依。If security services such as encryption or signing are enabled, these are automatically applied to your data by the . 會將使用建立時，您所提供的資料流的資料傳輸。The transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the . 當您提供此基礎資料流時，您可以指定是否關閉也會關閉基礎資料流。When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the also closes the underlying stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用用戶端-伺服器連線的用戶端。The following code example demonstrates the client side of a client-server connection that uses the . 用戶端驗證，並以非同步方式將訊息傳送到伺服器。The client authenticates and sends a message to the server asynchronously. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#0)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用用戶端與伺服器連接的伺服器端來驗證用戶端和讀取用戶端所傳送的訊息。The following code example demonstrates the server side of a client-server connection that uses the to authenticate the client and read a message sent by the client. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncServer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CPP/NclNegoAsyncServer.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncServer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CS/server.cs#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證會使用用戶端的。The authentication uses the client's . 沒有服務主體名稱 (SPN) 指定的伺服器。No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server. 模擬層級，安全性層級是，而且會要求相互驗證。The impersonation level is , the security level is , and mutual authentication is requested. 類別將會建構用於相互驗證的 SPN。The class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication. 當驗證成功時，您必須檢查並屬性，以決定哪些安全性服務由。When authentication succeeds, you must check the and properties to determine what security services are used by the . 檢查屬性來判斷是否發生相互驗證。Check the property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred. 如果驗證失敗，您會收到或。If the authentication fails, you receive an or an . 在此情況下，您可以重試一次使用不同的認證驗證。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證會使用用戶端的。The authentication uses the client's . 沒有服務主體名稱 (SPN) 指定的伺服器。No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server. 模擬層級，和安全性層級是。The impersonation level is , and the security level is . 類別將會建構用於相互驗證的 SPN。The class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication. 這個方法是非同步的而且不會封鎖在作業完成時。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種方法多載。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 非同步驗證作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，會叫用方法`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 如果驗證失敗，您會收到或。If the authentication fails, you receive an or an . 在此情況下，您可以重試一次使用不同的認證驗證。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法，以開始非同步的驗證用戶端。The following code example demonstrates calling this method to begin an asynchronous authentication for the client. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已啟用加密、 簽署或加密和簽署，讀取的作業會從基礎資料流讀取資料、 檢查資料的完整性和加以解密。If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and decrypts it. 如果沒有安全性服務，例如資料加密或簽章是使用中，此方法會啟動在基礎資料流的非同步讀取的作業。If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous read operation on the underlying stream. 這個方法是非同步的而且不會封鎖在作業完成時。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要封鎖，直到作業完成為止，使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 非同步讀取的作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，會叫用方法`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 類別不支援多個同時讀取作業。The class does not support multiple simultaneous read operations. 如果您嘗試開始讀取的作業，而另一個讀取作業已經在執行相同的資料流，會擲回例外狀況。If you attempt to start a read operation while another read operation is already executing on the same stream, a exception will be thrown. 您無法呼叫此方法，直到您已成功驗證。You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated. 若要驗證，請呼叫其中一種， ， ，或方法。To authenticate, call one of the , , , or methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何啟動的非同步讀取的作業。The following code example demonstrates starting an asynchronous read operation. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已啟用加密、 簽署或加密和簽章，這個方法從緩衝區讀取資料、 加密、 簽章或加密和加以簽署，並將其使用基礎資料流傳送。If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, this method reads the data from buffer, encrypts, signs, or encrypts and signs it, and transmits it using the underlying stream. 如果沒有安全性服務，例如資料加密或簽章是使用中，這個方法會叫用在基礎資料流。If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method invokes on the underlying stream. 此方法會封鎖寫入作業完成時。This method blocks while the write operation completes. 若要防止封鎖作業完成時，使用方法。To prevent blocking while the operation completes, use the method. 您無法呼叫此方法，直到您已成功驗證。You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated. 若要驗證，請呼叫其中一種， ， ，或方法。To authenticate, call one of the , , , or methods. 類別不支援多個同時的寫入作業。The class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations. 如果您嘗試開始寫入作業，而另一個寫入作業已經在執行相同的資料流，會擲回例外狀況。If you attempt to start a write operation while another write operation is already executing on the same stream, a exception will be thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何寫入至。The following code example demonstrates writing to a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回所叫用傳回的值基礎資料流上的屬性。This property returns the value returned by invoking the property on the underlying stream. 指定的值設定為設定作業，基礎資料流上的值。For set operations, the specified value sets the value on the underlying stream. 如果基礎資料流，以毫秒為單位，且設定為預設的寫入作業執行逾時。If the underlying stream is a , is in milliseconds and is set to by default so that write operations do not time out. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
